source: Reason for enlistment: I was inspired by your countless deeds of heroism.
target:
危険を顧みず、幾多の冒険に挑む
英雄の姿に感動して志願

source: Reason for enlistment: To serve both my Grand Company and my fellow Eorzeans as bravely as you do.
target:
グランドカンパニーと都市民のため、
献身的に働く様子に魂を揺さぶられ志願

source: Reason for enlistment: To challenge the limits of my abilities as you challenge yours.
target:
己の強さを追求し続ける、
荒々しさに魅力を感じて志願

source: Reason for enlistment: I wish to emulate your calm and resourcefulness in the face of chaos.
target:
緊急事態や不測の騒動に駆けつけては、
物事を解決する姿に心を打たれ志望

source: Reason for enlistment: I wish to serve under an officer whose hands can create as well as destroy.
target:
寡黙に、それでいて楽しげに、
職人仕事に励む姿に心を打たれて志願

source: Reason for enlistment: I would follow a commander who appreciates the blessings of nature.
target:
各地で粛々と自然の恵みを採集する、
誠実な人柄に惹かれて志願

source: Reason for enlistment: I wish to serve under an officer who can balance work and play.
target:
ゴールドソーサーで見かけた、
英雄の意外な一面を知って志願
